name: Intelday Solutions
description:
Intelday Solutions JSC is Bulgarian private PR and Advertising Company established in 2001. It specializes in corporate and international PR, healthcare and social PR, public affairs and heritage management. The company is a full member of the Association of the Advertising Agencies in Bulgaria, the Bulgarian Association of Public Relation Companies and an associated member of the Bulgarian Web Association.
The enterprise has been among the drivers for the adoption of a common Ethical Code of the PR professionals in Bulgaria.
